newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Dhaka stocks end up 5.76 pct in continuous rally.
newsitem.headline: Dhaka stocks end up 5.76 pct in continuous rally.

text.p: Dhaka stocks ended yet another bullish session sending its benchmark index soaring by 5.76 percent ahead of the Moslem Friday weekend, brokers said.
The Dhaka Stock Exchange (DSE) index rose 162.67 points to 2,986.29. Turnover hit a new high at 491.9 million taka. Of the 117 issues traded, 104 rose and 13 lost.

Brokers said retailers continued to mount buying pressure. "There were huge unmet orders carried over from previous sessions. We just cannot just cope with the burgeoning demand from hundreds of investors," said one broker. Bangladesh Tobacco Company rose 7.36 taka to 347.50 and Amam Sea Food gained 728.57 to 16,328.57.
